snippet: The case of Jon-Adrian Velazquez, imprisoned based on witnesses’ identification in an ex-policeman’s killing, is being brought to the Conviction Integrity Unit of District Attorney Cyrus Vance Jr.
lead_paragraph: The case of Jon-Adrian Velazquez, imprisoned based on witnesses’ identification in an ex-policeman’s killing, is being brought to the Conviction Integrity Unit of District Attorney Cyrus Vance Jr.

headline.main: Manhattan D.A. Is Asked to Seek to Undo 1999 Murder Conviction
headline.print_headline: Manhattan Prosecutors Are Asked to Undo a ’99 Murder Conviction
headline.seo: Manhattan D.A.’s Office Is Asked to Seek to Undo Murder Conviction
